message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a price of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your desire to stay within budget, the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. This represents a considerable investment on your part, but I'm confident the returns will justify it.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and while I appreciate the reduction, I still need to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,250,000.
